Query: SELECT AVG(line_item_quantity) AS Average_Basket_Size FROM bill_summary JOIN users ON bill_summary.dim_event_user_id = users.user_id WHERE users.slab_name = 'BLUE' GROUP BY bill_id

Prompt: Total sales of the year 2023, but remove BLUE slab customers
Query: SELECT SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM bill_summary b JOIN users u ON b.dim_event_user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.dim_event_date_id BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' AND u.slab_name != 'BLUE'

SELECT      c.name,     COUNT(DISTINCT r.dim_event_user_id) AS unique_responders,     SUM(r.redeemed_points) AS total_redeemed_points,     SUM(r.total_lineitem_qty) AS total_items_purchased,     SUM(r.bill_amount) AS total_bill_amount FROM      campaigns c JOIN      response_bill_summary r ON c.campaign_id = r.dim_campaign_id WHERE      c.name LIKE '%EOSS%' GROUP BY      c.name;

SELECT      u.slab_name,     SUM(b.bill_amount) / COUNT(DISTINCT b.bill_id) AS ATV,     SUM(b.bill_amount) AS Total_Sales FROM      users u JOIN      bill_summary b ON u.user_id = b.dim_event_user_id GROUP BY      u.slab_name;

Prompt: Month on month ATV of Platinum slab customers from 2023-04-01 to till now
Query: SELECT      d.month,      d.year,      SUM(bs.bill_amount) / COUNT(DISTINCT bs.bill_id) AS Average_Transaction_Value FROM      users u JOIN      bill_summary bs ON u.user_id = bs.dim_event_user_id JOIN      date d ON bs.dim_event_date_id = d.date_id WHERE      u.slab_name = 'Platinum'      AND d.date >= '2023-04-01' GROUP BY      d.year, d.month ORDER BY      d.year, d.month;

Prompt: Show total sales from Pune stores
Query: SELECT SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM bill_summary b JOIN zone_tills z ON b.dim_event_zone_till_id = z.till_id WHERE z.zn_city = 'Pune';

Prompt: SHow me concept wise region wise city wise total bills and sales
Query: SELECT     z.concept,     z.zn_state AS region,     z.zn_city AS city,     COUNT(b.bill_id) AS total_bills,     SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM     bill_summary b JOIN     zone_tills z ON b.dim_event_user_id = z.till_id GROUP BY     z.concept, z.zn_state, z.zn_city
SELECT u.slab_name, SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM users u JOIN bill_summary b ON u.user_id = b.dim_event_user_id GROUP BY u.slab_name
SELECT      u.slab_name,      SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM      users u JOIN      bill_summary b ON u.user_id = b.dim_event_user_id GROUP BY      u.slab_name;
SELECT u.slab_name, SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM users u JOIN bill_summary b ON u.user_id = b.dim_event_user_id GROUP BY u.slab_name

Prompt: total sales for PLATINUM slab customers
Query: SELECT SUM(b.bill_amount) AS total_sales FROM bill_summary b JOIN users u ON b.dim_event_user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.slab_name = 'PLATINUM';
